name: Space Taxi
overview: A very addictive game. Collect your passenger and deliver them to their destination whilst avoiding obstacles! Piloting a Space Taxi, you must pick up passengers from "pads" and carry them to whatever other pads they wish to go. Space Taxi features screens with varying obstacles and challenges that must be navigated in order to collect your fare. Although Space Taxis sort of resemble standard cabs, they operate on a different principle - the longer you take to deliver a passenger, the less money you collect. In addition to watching the clock because of an incentive to collect money, players have to be aware of their fuel supply. Run out of fuel, and you will crash.
